I have been taking Topamax for 3 years now, for fibro and bipolar disorder.  My dosage has been 150mg twice daily and on this dosage I have not experienced any pain and my mood has been stable.  Getting onto this drug was difficult for me, I am an ex street drug user and while getting onto this medication it made my body feel like I was withdrawing from drugs at the times I was in between my doses.  Once that was over the normal weight loss that most have, carbonated drinks etc I also experienced.  Something that I have experienced that I have not read about is a MAJOR increase in food sensitivities.  I am in my 40's and I have read that women who are hormonal can become food intolerant while taking Topamax.  Recently I reduced my dosage to 100mg twice daily and my pain has reared its ugly head.   For me topamax is a good medication.  Good luck everyone.
